sentence: Malaysia Airlines MH17 heading from Amsterdam to Kuala Lumpur crashed in eastern Ukraine on Thursday.
The plane was carrying 298 people on broad.

After the incident happened, Ukraine has accused pro-Russian separatists of shooting down the plane flying from Amsterdam to Kuala Lumpur and the rebels denied it. Different parties react to the issue.
Different parties react to the issue.
Malaysia is sending a team to Ukraine to help with the investigation.

Meanwhile, other airlines have announced they are now setting flight paths to avoid eastern Ukraine, and Ukraine authorities have declared the area a no-fly zone, according to European flight safety body Eurocontrol.
